data.name: Sniper Rust VR Demo
data.detailed_description:
Sniper Rust VR -Trial Version presents one of the 18 chapters from the full version, a virtual reality adventure set against an armed militia uprising across international borders.

As the Agency’s most-skilled hired gun, players are called to put their sniping skills to the test in a first-person, this demo campaign features :

  • Cutting-edge Weaponry : Stalk your prey with one of the lethal firearms, pre-unlocked and crafted with attention to detail for an immersive VR experience.

  • Death-dealing enemy troops: Diverse enemy classes make every playable mission a challenge; be wary of well-concealed snipers, air/group assaults behind enemy lines.

  • Orchestral auditory feedback : A John Leonard French soundtrack to please even the world’s best sharpshooter.

data.short_description: A Virtual Reality campaign pitting you, the Agency’s best sharpshooter, against a global insurgency.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 CPU @ 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4720HQ 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
